name: NoTowersDefence
description:
NoTowersDefence is a tower defence game... but without towers! 

Hi, this was my first ever game jam so dont be too harsh :D

Left click to shoot, Right click to use your special attack (if you have the upgrade) and WASD to move around

Didn't have enough time to fully add credits to the game so you can buy everything from the start. I was also planning to do 3 other classes but had no where near enough time to implement them (mostly from my inexperience lol).

Also, you can walk off of the screen. That was something I was planning on adding near the end but never got time.

Thanks to anyone who plays, I really enjoyed making it (wish i had enough time to finish it tho)
